Segment.name: R12
Segment.comment: To provide summary information for work order details for a specific piece of equipment

Field.name: NumberOfLineItems
Field.comment: Total number of line items in the transaction set

Field.name: EquipmentInitial1
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber1
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: LoadEmptyStatusCode
Field.comment: Code which specifies the loaded condition of transportation equipment

Field.name: EquipmentInitial2
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber2
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: EquipmentNumberCheckDigit
Field.comment: Number which designates the check digit applied to a piece of equipment

SyntaxNote.name: P0809
SyntaxNote.comment: If either R1208 or R1209 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1109
SyntaxNote.comment: If R1211 is present, then R1209 is required.
